ygData.subject: Re: Shifting gears to thermal cloak...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I haven t yet tried it, but maybe people should try putting a needle and/or thimble that are made through smithing in with the other stuff? Just an idea,
ygData.messageBody:
GoodSmritn@... wrote:
>
> From: GoodSmritn@...
>
> Just a heads up bud ,the tattered cloak is the item you earn when you
> complete the initial guild message errund and i think now the new pattern for
> the cloak does allow for components to make the cloak more available. The
> recipie for thermal cloak is said to be this:
> 1 small tattered cloak
> 1 firewater (water and gnomish spirits)
> 1 metal rod
> 1 metal rod
> *should cost around 4pp each to make
> Sincerely Cloverleaf - Fennin Ro -Gnome Enchanter Extrordinare
>

I haven't yet tried it, but maybe people should try putting a needle
and/or thimble that are made through smithing in with the other stuff?

Just an idea,
Folimun Fyreglyph - Gnome Wizard on Brell
